00042 CSwordModuleInfo::CSwordModuleInfo( SWModule* module ) {
00043     m_module = module;
00044     m_searchResult.ClearList();
00045     m_dataCache.name = QString::fromLatin1(module->Name());
00046     m_dataCache.isUnicode = m_module->isUnicode();
00047 
00048     if (backend()) {
00049         if (hasVersion() && (minimumSwordVersion() > SWVersion::currentVersion)) {
00050             qWarning("The module \"%s\" requires a newer Sword library. Please update to \"Sword %s\".", name().latin1(), (const char*)minimumSwordVersion());
00051         }
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 CSwordModuleInfo::CSwordModuleInfo( const CSwordModuleInfo& m ) {
00056     m_module = m.m_module;
00057     m_searchResult = m.m_searchResult;
00058 }

00060 
00062 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordModuleInfo::clone(){
00063     return new CSwordModuleInfo(*this);
00064 }
00065 
00066 CSwordModuleInfo::~CSwordModuleInfo(){
00067     m_searchResult.ClearList();
00068     m_module = 0; //the Sword module object is deleted by the backend
00069 }
00070 
00072 const CSwordModuleInfo::UnlockErrorCode CSwordModuleInfo::unlock( const QString& unlockKey ){
00073     CSwordModuleInfo::UnlockErrorCode   ret = CSwordModuleInfo::noError;
00074     SWConfig moduleConfig("");
00075     if ( backend()->moduleConfig(name(), moduleConfig) ) {
00076         moduleConfig[name().latin1()]["CipherKey"] = unlockKey.local8Bit(); 
00077         backend()->setCipherKey(name().latin1(), unlockKey.local8Bit());    
00078         (*backend()->getConfig()) += moduleConfig;
00079         (*backend()->getConfig())[name().latin1()]["CipherKey"] = moduleConfig[name().latin1()]["CipherKey"];
00080         moduleConfig.Save();
00081     }   
00082     else
00083         ret = CSwordModuleInfo::wrongUnlockKey;
00084     return ret;
00085 }
00086 
00088 CHTMLEntryDisplay* const CSwordModuleInfo::getDisplay() const {
00089     return dynamic_cast<CHTMLEntryDisplay*>(m_module->Disp());
00090 }
00091 
00093 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::isLocked() {
00094     if (isEncrypted() && config(CipherKey).isEmpty())
00095         return true;
00096     return false;
00097 }
00098 
00100 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::isEncrypted() const {
00105     ConfigEntMap config = backend()->getConfig()->Sections.find( name().latin1() )->second;
00106     ConfigEntMap::iterator it = config.find("CipherKey");
00107     if (it != config.end())
00108         return true;
00109     return false;
00110 }
00111 
00112 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::hasVersion() const {
00113     const string version = (*backend()->getConfig())[name().latin1()]["Version"];
00114     return version.length();
00115 }

00117 
00119 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percentUpdate)(char, void*) ) {
00120     int searchType = 0;
00121     int searchFlags = REG_ICASE;
00122     
00123     //work around Swords thread insafety for Bibles and Commentaries
00124     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(this) );
00125     SWKey* s = dynamic_cast<SWKey*>(key.get());
00126     if (s)
00127         m_module->SetKey(*s);
00128     
00129     //setup variables required for Sword
00130     if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::caseSensitive)
00131         searchFlags = 0;
00132 
00133     if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::multipleWords)
00134         searchType = -2; //multiple words   
00135     else if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::exactPhrase)
00136         searchType = -1; //exact phrase
00137     else if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::regExp)
00138         searchType = 0; //regexp matching
00139 
00140     if ((searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::useLastResult) && m_searchResult.Count()) {        
00141         util::scoped_ptr<SWKey> searchScope( m_searchResult.clone() );
00142         m_searchResult = m_module->Search(searchedText.utf8(), searchType, searchFlags, searchScope, 0, percentUpdate);
00143     }
00144     else if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::useScope) {
00145         m_searchResult = m_module->Search(searchedText.utf8(), searchType, searchFlags, (type() != Lexicon && type() != GenericBook) ? &scope : 0, 0, percentUpdate);
00146     }
00147   else
00148     m_searchResult = m_module->Search(searchedText.utf8(), searchType, searchFlags, 0, 0, percentUpdate);
00149     return (m_searchResult.Count()>0);
00150 }
00151 
00153 ListKey& CSwordModuleInfo::searchResult(const ListKey* newResult) {
00154     if (newResult)
00155         m_searchResult.copyFrom( *newResult );  
00156     return m_searchResult;
00157 }
00158 
00160 void CSwordModuleInfo::clearSearchResult(){
00161     m_searchResult.ClearList();
00162 }

00165 void CSwordModuleInfo::interruptSearch(){
00166     m_module->terminateSearch = true;
00167 }

00170 const SWVersion CSwordModuleInfo::minimumSwordVersion(){
00171     return SWVersion( config(CSwordModuleInfo::MinimumSwordVersion).latin1() );
00172 }

00175 const QString CSwordModuleInfo::name() const {
00176     return m_dataCache.name;

00180 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::isUnicode(){
00181     return m_dataCache.isUnicode;

00183 
00184 const QString CSwordModuleInfo::config( const CSwordModuleInfo::ConfigEntry entry) {
00185     switch (entry) {
00186         case AboutInformation:
00187         {
00188             QString about = QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("About"));
00189             if (!about.isEmpty()) { 
00190                 RTFHTML filter;
00191                 const int len = about.length()+600;
00192                 char dummy[len];
00193                 strcpy(dummy, about.local8Bit());
00194         
00195                 filter.ProcessText(dummy,len,0);
00196                 about = QString::fromLocal8Bit(dummy);
00197             }           
00198             return about;
00199         }       
00200         case CipherKey:
00201             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("CipherKey"));
00202         case AbsoluteDataPath:
00203             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("AbsoluteDataPath"));
00204         case DataPath:
00205             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("DataPath"));
00206         case Description:
00207             return QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->Description());         
00208         case ModuleVersion:
00209             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("Version"));
00210         case MinimumSwordVersion: {
00211             const QString version = QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("MinimumVersion"));
00212             return !version.isEmpty() ? version : QString::fromLatin1("0.0");
00213         }
00214         case TextDir: {
00215             const QString dir = QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("Direction"));
00216             return !dir.isEmpty() ? dir : QString::fromLatin1("LtoR");
00217         }       
00218     case DisplayLevel: {
00219             const QString level = QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("DisplayLevel"));
00220             return !level.isEmpty() ? level : QString::fromLatin1("0");
00221         }
00222         default:
00223             return QString::null;
00224     }
00225 }
00226 
00228 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::has( const CSwordModuleInfo::Feature feature ){
00229     switch (feature) {
00230         case StrongsNumbers:
00231             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "StrongsNumber");
00232         case GreekDef:
00233             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "GreekDef");        
00234         case HebrewDef:
00235             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "HebrewDef");       
00236         case GreekParse:
00237             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "GreekParse");      
00238         case HebrewParse:
00239             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "HebrewParse");     
00240         case DailyDevotion:
00241             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "DailyDevotion");       
00242         case Glossary:
00243             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "Glossary");        
00244     }
00245     return 0;
00246 }
00247 
00248 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::has( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option ){
00249     //BAD workaround to see if the filter is GBF or ThML!   
00250     if (m_module->getConfig().has("GlobalOptionFilter",QString::fromLatin1("GBF%1").arg(backend()->configOptionName(option)).latin1()))
00251         return true;
00252     if (m_module->getConfig().has("GlobalOptionFilter",QString::fromLatin1("ThML%1").arg(backend()->configOptionName(option)).latin1()))
00253         return true;
00254     if (m_module->getConfig().has("GlobalOptionFilter",QString::fromLatin1("UTF8%1").arg(backend()->configOptionName(option)).latin1()))
00255         return true;        
00256     if (m_module->getConfig().has("GlobalOptionFilter",backend()->configOptionName(option).latin1()))
00257         return true;
00258     
00259     return false;
00260 }
00261 
00263 const CSwordModuleInfo::TextDirection CSwordModuleInfo::textDirection(){
00264   if (config(TextDir) == "RtoL")
00265     return CSwordModuleInfo::RightToLeft;
00266   else
00267     return CSwordModuleInfo::LeftToRight;
00268 }
